title: Remove Lee ward jumping.
body: There is a literal no escape or counterplay when lee dashes to ward slows you and Q. You simply die or burn your flash so he can comeback after 1 min. Honestly im sick of this. I dodge his Q and he ward jump ults me. He has no CD for his ult either. Why do you allow this to continur Riot...

replies.body: Cmon man he's already blind; isn't he at enough of a disadvantage.
